package:
av_pointcloud 1.0.1 The av_pointcloud package is responsible for processing and managing point cloud data for the active vision system. This package includes source code, launch files, and configuration files required for creating and handling both full and segmented point clouds. Michele Carlo La Greca Apache 2.0
